answers.answer: The lady who took my blood said in normal cases if the drink makes you sick then you most likely have diabetes. I passed mine and yeah the hour wait was the worst part! Hope your results come back normal good luck momma
Thanks! Mine was two hours long, it wouldn't of been so bad if it was just an hour

question: So i drank that sweet stuff they give you, and it wasnt that bad it just tasted like extra sweet sprite. But ive already been here for over an hour and its killing me im sooooo hungry this ***** and my arm hurts from all the blood theyve tooken out and theres still more they have to take soon im just soo ready for this to be over, its only 9:30 but im craving a big ol juicy burger lol. I think this is the longest time ive gone without food the fasting is the hardest part for me. Well i just hope the results are good but i dont think i have gestational diabetes ive felt fine during my whole pregnancy
title: diabetes test vest
